item.description:
The showtime is at 8PM. Let's meet up at the escalators near the front door in the lobby. For those of you who may be new to the group, I wear a little movie group badge.

After the movie, if the group is interested, we can go to a local restauraunt/bar for food and drinks. There are several nearby that the group has gone to often, however, I am always open to suggestions.

Feel free to contact me directly, if you have any questions about the event.

See you there!

If you are unfamiliar with the film you can see the trailer at:

http://www.myspace.co...
item.name: The Invisible
